channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump signals interest in easing tensions, but Minneapolis sees little change on the streets
item.description: President Donald Trump seemed to signal a willingness to ease tensions in Minneapolis after a second deadly shooting by federal immigration agents.
